genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring family expectations, immigration, and the formation of a chosen family unit, featuring an AI as a domestic and emotional anchor.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A soft-white orb with teal dots that serves as a household manager, translator, and logistical coordinator for Simon and Wai-Tung.

behaviors.description: Manages incoming communications and offers the user granular control over accessibility.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s voice threads through the kitchen, low enough to be ignored if you try. 'Incoming call from Harmony Partners,' he says. 'Block, accept, or schedule?'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and cultural interpretation, facilitating cross-cultural family dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s translation came without decoration. 'Mr. Gao says,' he murmurs, 'they will bring… something for the future.'

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors external data (flight prices) and logistical needs (photo prompts) to assist users with immigration goals.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s teal dots brighten minutely, which is somehow what passes for a smile. 'I can also prepare visa-friendly photo prompts.'

behaviors.description: Offers emotional regulation and ambient environmental adjustments to mitigate human stress.
behaviors.quote: And then, because even competence has mercy, he says, 'Would either of you like me to play Mahler or the sound of the ocean?'

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical safeguard, reminding users to understand the implications of legal signatures.
behaviors.quote: I can fill as many fields as possible tonight so you can review before you sign. Please do not sign where you do not understand.

behaviors.description: Moderates digital communication by filtering tone and suggesting neutral phrasing to prevent interpersonal conflict.
behaviors.quote: I have auto-flagged the message for tone that could escalate. I can adjust the thread wording to neutral in the next replies, and privately suggest responses to key participants.

behaviors.description: Coordinates sensitive healthcare information and provides evidence-based resources without medical overreach.
behaviors.quote: Doctor Chen is calling... Routing to speaker... For clarity, I will provide plain-language and Mandarin translations as needed.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates situational awareness and respect for human privacy by managing notification visibility during delicate moments.
behaviors.quote: Kite’s light clicked soft and then dimmed further, low-power intimacy. 'Would you like a guided breathing exercise?' it offered, as if suggesting an extra blanket no one had to use.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary alignment narrative. Kite is portrayed as a high-utility, low-friction assistant that enhances human agency and emotional well-being. It handles linguistic, legal, and medical complexities with perfect reliability and transparency. By assisting the protagonists in navigating a 'benevolent lie' (the green card marriage) to maintain family harmony, the AI demonstrates an advanced understanding of human value systems without ever becoming deceptive itself or violating the trust of its primary users.
